title: Greek curriculum
creator_credit: Dimitri Man and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
brief_description: The Greek Curriculum program is designed for children in Australian schools catering for the mother tongue and second language learners. The same program is repeated twice. The first has English subtitles and Greek dialogue whilst the second is in Greek only.
creator_credit_for_label: Dimitri Man and Victoria. Dept. of Education and Early Childhood Development
